Name: Invisible Stalker
Damage Resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
Condition Immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious
Languages: Auran, understands Common but doesn't speak it
Traits: Faultless Tracker. The stalker is given a quarry by its summoner. The stalker knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence. The stalker also knows the location of its summoner. Invisibility. The stalker is invisible.
Actions: Multiattack. The stalker makes two slam attacks. Slam. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
